h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: Keep building up your Focus with light combos by chasing him down and using Immobilize to keep him from teleporting away, and use any lulls in his projectile attacks to rack up damage, and then unleash a charged pillar or thrust attack before he can escape.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
Keep building up your Focus with light combos by chasing him down and using Immobilize to keep him from teleporting away, and use any lulls in his projectile attacks to rack up damage, and then unleash a charged pillar or thrust attack before he can escape.
